snippet: We published a letter from Gen. SCOTT some days since, in which he declined to be catechized as to his political creed, saying, in the first place, that his life and character afforded sufficient information on that subject, and in the next place,...
lead_paragraph: We published a letter from Gen. SCOTT some days since, in which he declined to be catechized as to his political creed, saying, in the first place, that his life and character afforded sufficient information on that subject, and in the next place, that if these were not enough, professions made for a special purpose and just upon the eve of an election, could not be of the slightest value.
